Title: The Viking Sagas
Actors: Ralf Moeller, Ingibjörg Stefánsdóttir, Sven-Ole Thorsen
Plot: A mythical warrior wanders the snow-capped landscapes of the North territories on an arduous quest for vengeance. Amid nobles and schemers, saints and brutes, and lovers and fools, this Viking swings his sword for his family's hon...
